articles.title: The Messi of maths: Argentinian Luis Caffarelli wins Abel prize - The Guardian
articles.description: Caffarelli, 74, takes top trophy for work on partial differential equations, the first winner from South America
articles.content:
First football, and now maths. Three months after Lionel Messi triumphed at the World Cup, an Argentinian has won the top international trophy in mathematics.

articles.title: European stocks cautiously higher after UK inflation surpasses expectations; Fed rate decision due - CNBC
articles.description: European markets opened flat on Wednesday, after U.K. inflation unexpectedly accelerated.
articles.content:
U.K. annual inflation increased from 10.1% in January to 10.4% in February, official figures showed. Economists in a Refinitiv poll expected a 9.9% increase.
